lines.i: The Indication Observation documents the rationale for an activity. It can do this with the id element to reference a problem recorded elsewhere in the document or with a code and value to record the problem type and problem within the Indication. For example, the indication for a prescription of a painkiller might be a headache that is documented in the Problems Section
